doc.title: Saddlebags
doc.plot: SADDLEBAGS, pits four unlikely female heroes against an evil, double-crossing Sheriff, a hapless snake oil salesman and the odd homosexual Bavarian pacifist. After a freak mining accident in their 1890s Northwestern town kills all the men, an unlikely quartet - Mrs. Cranston, the hard nosed Scottish shopkeeper; Humility, a sexually repressed religious zealot; Mary, the worst whore in the west; and Jane, a fragile English rose - band together to start a new life...or die trying.
